name: SlimHelvetical
description:
SlimCal [ http://userstyles.org/styles/26047 ] rolled for Helvetical users [ http://www.iamadtaylor.com/helvetical/ ].  Also extends Helvetical by adding "today" highlighting in Month view.  

! WARNING !
This style breaks formatting in the Agenda view.  Users who must have the Agenda view should not load this style.
